import { Modal, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; const HomeCarousel = (props) => { const {carousel, convertToBase64, changeAdminOptions} = props const [localCarousel, setLocalCarousel] = useState(carousel) let [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false); const handleCloseModal = () => { setShowModal(false); }; const handleShowModal = () => { setShowModal(true); }; const handleUpload1= async (e)=>{ const file = e.target.files[0] const base64 = await convertToBase64(file) setLocalCarousel((prevCarousel)=>({...prevCarousel,img_1:base64})) // carousel.img_1 = base64 } const handleUpload2= async (e)=>{ const file = e.target.files[0] const base64 = await convertToBase64(file) setLocalCarousel((prevCarousel)=>({...prevCarousel,img_2:base64})) // carousel.img_2 = base64 } const handleUpload3= async (e)=>{ const file = e.target.files[0] const base64 = await convertToBase64(file) setLocalCarousel((prevCarousel)=>({...prevCarousel,img_3:base64})) // carousel.img_3 = base64 } const handleSaveClick = ()=>{ changeAdminOptions() handleCloseModal() } useEffect(() => { console.log(carousel?carousel.img_2:"") }, []) return ( <>
